answers.answer: Following the rules of hygiene is essential for protecting both your own health and the health of your family during difficult times. By prioritizing cleanliness and sanitation practices, you can significantly reduce the risk of contracting illnesses or spreading infections within your household. Additionally, practicing good hygiene habits helps maintain overall well-being and supports immunity against various diseases.
